rules_text:
Devoid [i](This card has no color.)[/i]
Tap up to one target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Coalesce {3}{U} [i](You may cast this for {3}{U} from your graveyard. If you do, put it onto the battlefield as an Eldrazi Horror creature. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
